trans-unit.source: Represents a cell of a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Representerer en celle i en <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCell"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCell"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: Determines the final size and placement of the cell content.
trans-unit.target: Bestemmer endelig størrelsen og plasseringen av celleinnholdet.

trans-unit.source: The ArrangeOverride method determines the arrangement of the cell content with a gridline on the right.
trans-unit.target: Metoden ArrangeOverride bestemmer plasseringen av celleinnholdet med rutenett til høyre.

trans-unit.source: The maximum size that the cell can occupy.
The final size of the control.
Gets or sets the column that the cell is in.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir kolonnen som cellen.

trans-unit.source: The column that the cell is in.
Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCell.Column*> dependency property.
To be added.
Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the cell is in edit mode.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om cellen er i redigeringsmodus.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the cell is in edit mode; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis cellen i redigeringsmodus; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The registered default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
For more information about what can influence the value, see <xref href="System.Windows.DependencyProperty"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om hva kan påvirke verdien <xref href="System.Windows.DependencyProperty"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCell.IsEditing*> dependency property.
To be added.
Gets a value that indicates whether the cell can be put in edit mode.
trans-unit.target: Henter en verdi som angir om cellen kan plasseres i redigeringsmodus.

trans-unit.source: Set the IsReadOnly property to `true` to make an individual cell read-only.
trans-unit.target: Angi egenskapen IsReadOnly `true` foreta enkelte celler skrivebeskyttet.

trans-unit.source: Set the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridColumn.IsReadOnly%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to `true` to make all cells in an individual column read-only.
trans-unit.target: Angi den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridColumn.IsReadOnly%2A?displayProperty=fullName>egenskapen `true` gjør alle celler på en individuell kolonne skrivebeskyttet.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridColumn.IsReadOnly%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Set the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.IsReadOnly%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to `true` to make all cells in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid> read-only If there is a conflict between the settings at the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid>, column, and cell levels, a value of `true` takes precedence over a value of `false`.
trans-unit.target: Angi den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.IsReadOnly%2A?displayProperty=fullName>egenskapen `true` slik at alle celler i den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid>skrivebeskyttet hvis det oppstår en konflikt mellom innstillingene hos den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid>, kolonne og celle nivåer, verdien `true` overstyrer verdien `false`.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.IsReadOnly%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the cell cannot be put in edit mode; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis cellen ikke kan settes redigeringsmodus; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The registered default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
For more information about what can influence the value, see <xref href="System.Windows.DependencyProperty"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om hva kan påvirke verdien <xref href="System.Windows.DependencyProperty"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCell.IsReadOnly*> dependency property.
To be added.
Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the cell is selected.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om cellen er valgt.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCell.Selected> event occurs when the IsSelected property is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCell.Selected>inntreffer når IsSelected-egenskapen er satt til `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCell.Selected>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCell.Unselected> event occurs when the IsSelected property is set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCell.Unselected>inntreffer når IsSelected-egenskapen er satt til `false`.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCell.Unselected>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the cell is selected; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis cellen er merket. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The registered default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
For more information about what can influence the value, see <xref href="System.Windows.DependencyProperty"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om hva kan påvirke verdien <xref href="System.Windows.DependencyProperty"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCell.IsSelected*> dependency property.
To be added.
Determines the desired size of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCell"></xref>.
The MeasureOverride method measures the area needed for the cell and the gridline on the right.
trans-unit.target: Metoden MeasureOverride måler området for cellen og rutenett til høyre.

trans-unit.source: The maximum size that the cell can occupy.
The desired size of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCell"></xref>.
Called when the cell's <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCell.Column*> property changes.
This method is not called if changes are made to the current column definition.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden kalles ikke hvis endringer av gjeldende kolonnedefinisjonen.

trans-unit.source: It is called only if the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCell.Column%2A> property is set.
The old column definition.
The new column definition.
Returns the automation peer for this <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCell"></xref>.

The <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DataGridCellAutomationPeer> exposes the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid> to [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uiautomation#initcap](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-uiautomationsharpinitcap-md.md)].
The automation peer for this <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCell"></xref>.
Called when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCell.IsEditing*> property changes.
This method changes the visual state of the cell between the Editing and Display states.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden endrer visual tilstanden til cellen mellom tilstander redigering og vise.

trans-unit.source: The new value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCell.IsEditing*> property.
Reports that a key was pressed.
trans-unit.target: Rapporterer at en nøkkel ble brukt.

trans-unit.source: This method passes keyboard input to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCell.Column%2A> that contains the cell.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden sender tastaturinndata i <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCell.Column%2A>som inneholder cellen.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCell.Column%2A>

trans-unit.source: Each column handles the input in a way that is appropriate for the column type.
trans-unit.target: Hver kolonne behandler inndataene på en måte som passer for kolonnetypen.

trans-unit.source: The data for the event.
Reports that a key was pressed.
trans-unit.target: Rapporterer at en nøkkel ble brukt.

trans-unit.source: This method passes keyboard input to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCell.Column%2A> that contains the cell.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden sender tastaturinndata i <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCell.Column%2A>som inneholder cellen.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCell.Column%2A>

trans-unit.source: Each column handles the input in a way that is appropriate for the column type.
trans-unit.target: Hver kolonne behandler inndataene på en måte som passer for kolonnetypen.

trans-unit.source: The data for the event.
Draws the cell and the right side gridline.
The drawing instructions for the cell.
Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCell.Selected"></xref> event.
Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: Opprettet en hendelse aktiverer hendelsesbehandlingen via en representant.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [NIB: Raising an Event](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/f2adaf01-1ed1-42e1-8c31-8d467e7e0ee2).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se [NIB: opprettet en hendelse](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/f2adaf01-1ed1-42e1-8c31-8d467e7e0ee2).

trans-unit.source: The OnSelected method also enables derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: Metoden OnSelected kan også avledede klasser behandle hendelsen uten å knytte representant.

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: Dette er den foretrukne metoden for behandling av hendelsen i en avledet klasse.

trans-unit.source: The data for the event.
Reports text composition.
This method passes text input to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCell.Column%2A> that contains the cell.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden sender tekstinndata i <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCell.Column%2A>som inneholder cellen.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCell.Column%2A>

trans-unit.source: Each column handles the input in a way that is appropriate for the column type.
trans-unit.target: Hver kolonne behandler inndataene på en måte som passer for kolonnetypen.

trans-unit.source: The data for the event.
Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCell.Unselected"></xref> event.
Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: Opprettet en hendelse aktiverer hendelsesbehandlingen via en representant.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [NIB: Raising an Event](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/f2adaf01-1ed1-42e1-8c31-8d467e7e0ee2).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se [NIB: opprettet en hendelse](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/f2adaf01-1ed1-42e1-8c31-8d467e7e0ee2).

trans-unit.source: The OnUnselected method also enables derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: Metoden OnUnselected kan også avledede klasser behandle hendelsen uten å knytte representant.

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: Dette er den foretrukne metoden for behandling av hendelsen i en avledet klasse.

trans-unit.source: The data for the event.
Occurs when the cell is selected.
This event occurs when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCell.IsSelected%2A> property is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Denne hendelsen oppstår når den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCell.IsSelected%2A>er satt til `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCell.IsSelected%2A>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
Identifies the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCell.Selected"></xref> routed event.
To be added.
Occurs when the cell selection is cleared.
This event occurs when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCell.IsSelected%2A> property is set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: Denne hendelsen oppstår når den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCell.IsSelected%2A>er satt til `false`.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCell.IsSelected%2A>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
Identifies the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCell.Unselected"></xref> routed event.
To be added.
